title: Talking about Troubles - third paragraph concern

content.question: In the third paragraph, the author is mainly concerned with

choices.label: chastising people who exaggerate their troubles to gain sympathy from others
revealing the selflessness of those who conceal their own suffering from others
affirming the value of patience by explaining the psychological benefits of listening to others
urging verbal restraint by highlighting the impact of speech on the speaker's sense of reality

content.answer: urging verbal restraint by highlighting the impact of speech on the speaker's sense of reality

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
